messages.message:
On UAT, in a new project, I create two classes, and the CTL is "Reclassify documents". "Re-" why?
Can we just standardize on "Classify documents" in all cases? It's awkward to document creating classes when this button text changes.

Hmm I think the "Reclassify" is certain right (vs Re-classify). But curious if we chose reclassify over just classify to indicate that they were once already classified

CC: @Serena

i don’t think we ever explicitly discussed “Reclassify” vs “Classify” for the button text here

there’s no big reason to keep it as “Reclassify”, and “Classify” also makes more sense for the first time you run classification, so i’m fine with changing it to just always “Classify”
Lets do it. @Serena feels like a fairly trivial task, can create a ticket if you haven't already done so
